urlList.title: Direct video URLs
urlList.description: Optional list of Kuaishou video URLs.

limit.title: Max videos
limit.description: How many videos to download at most.

apifyProxyGroups.title: Proxy groups
apifyProxyGroups.description: Optional list of proxy groups, e.g. ["RESIDENTIAL"].

apifyProxyCountry.title: Proxy country
apifyProxyCountry.description: Two-letter country code for proxy geolocation, e.g. HK or SG.
